title: Mavala Scientifique (Nail Hardener)
description: The tip of the nail is the most fragile, most unprotected part and breaks easily. It frequently needs to be strengthened. Mavala was the first to produce a penetrating nail hardener that actually hardens nails immediately and helps prevent splitting of flaking. Formulated in 1958, Mavala Scientifique is absorbed into the nail tip to harden and strengthen it. One small 5 ml bottle holds a year's supply.

title: OPI Avoplex High-Intensity Hand and Nail Cream, 1.7 Fluid Ounce
description: Opi avoplex high intensity hand and nail cream provides intense repair for skin and nails in need of serious care due to cold weather, overexposure and everyday wear and tear. Packed with deep-penetrating protein peptides. Increases skin elasticity and nail flexibilty.

title: World Pride Nail Tape Stripe Decoration Sticker Hologram, Set of 10
